Content:
Studying or working which one do you like more
I likemore
Studying
Doing other things
Working

Is your job related to your major
My job is
My job is not
Related to my major
Fun and interesting
Flexible

Have you ever missed a deadline
I have
I have never
Missed a deadline
Talked to my boss
Been late for work

How do you manage your time
I usually 
Plan everything ahead
Maintain focus when working 
Avoid multitasking

What advice would you give a newbie
My advice is
To be confident
To work hard
To learn form your boss

Do you think students should do internships
I think students should
Do interships
Have a part-time job
Focus on studying

What should you prepare before applying for an intership
You should
Practice interviewing
Prepare your CV
Research the company

What is your advice for an interview
My advice is
To be honest
To start with a smile
Not to be late

Do you think doing an intership will affect our studies
I think doing an intership will
Gian us experience
Improve our skills
Affect our studies

How do you work and study during exam season
Iduring exam season
Work less
Studying during my work breaks
Take days off to study

What kind of company would you recommend to me
Maybe
A start-up company
A big corporation
A foreign company

What time is best for you
After lunch time
Aarly afternoon
Late morning

What is the purpose of the meeting
The purpose of the meeting is
Agenda review
Goal setting
Problem solving

What are some topics we discuss for the meeting
We'll be discussing several topics including
Project updates
Financial reports
Customer feedback

What are your expectations
I expect
quality results
timely completion
open communication

What is the duration of the meeting
Two hours
One hour and a half
Forty five minutes

What is the location of the meeting
It will take place in the
Meeting room
Conference room
Headquarter

What kind of personal reasons do you need time off for
I take some time off to
attend a family event
visit a sick relative
go on a vacation

How long do you wish to take some time off work
I am hoping to takeoff work
two weeks
five days
a few days

When do you need to take the time off
I will be out of the office from
the fifteenth of May
the third week of September
the middle of next month

Do you have a plan for your work while you are gone
I have been working on
delegating my documents
organizing my documents
prioritizing my tasks

Is there anyone who can cover your work
I have arranged withto cover for me
a coworker
someone from the department
a friend from another team

Can you complete any urgent tasks before you leave
I think it is
a must
manageable
doable

Where will our department go for bonding this year
We are planning to go to
a remote mountainous village
a beachside villa
a famous city abroad

Why are we going there
It has
pleasant weather
breathtaking scenery
unique culture

Are we staying at a homestay or a hotel
We will stay at
a cozy homestay
a comft hotel
a mountain homestay

What kind of activities are available there
I bet you will like that place because they give us
three complimentary lunches
spacious rooms
diverse recreational facilities

What will we eat on that day
We are gonna have
spicy fish hot pot
barbecue
beef fried rice with pickled mustard greens

Is there anything we can help you with
I need someone to
prepare the board games
buy food
prepare a first aid kit

How much does each person need to contribute
Each person needs to payfor the trip
one million dong
half a month's salary

Why did you call me today
I am sorry to say that we have to
let you go
notify you of termination
transfer your current tasks to someone else

Why am I getting fired
Our company has toto optimize business operations
cut operating costs
halt unnecessary projects
let go of under-performing employees

Can I work until month-end to find a new job
I think it is
allowed by the company's policy
reasonable for a smooth handover process
not in the best interest of both parties

Which important tasks do I need to take care before leaving the job
Thank you! I hope you can
finish up the financial report
finalize the content production plan for next month
complete the customer survey section

When should I complete the handovers
You have to finish it all by
the end of this month
the fifth day of the following month
this weekend

How do you think I have been doing in my job lately
In general you are one of the staff that makes me
appreciate the hard work
surprised by your transformation
admire for the perseverance

Is there anything I could do better
You can get better at
the ability to perform all job duties
negotiation skills
saying no

How did you find your time here
My time here has been
a mix of joy and weariness
fulfilling
enriching

Do you have any memorable moments during your time here
I will always remember
the late-night brainstorming sessions
the office pranks
the team outings

What do you think we could do to make the workplace better
I thinkwould help improve the working conditions for everyone
ensuring fair performance reviews
providing regular team-building activities
encouraging constructive feedback

What are your plans for the future
I am planning to
take some time offf
continue my education
spend more time with my family

Do you need any support as you move forward
Thank you for asking!I will definitely
reach out if I need any support
seek your advice if necessary
keep your updated
